title: 820-01041 no power
message: i have 820-01041 no power, T2 get hot.  USB C 5V 0.14Amp

title: 820-01041 no power
message:
Tried DFU?
If not recognized, check if all AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages are present.

title: 820-01041 no power
message:
The Diode reading for pp1v8_SLPS2R is 0.060v. when i remove 3 of 4 usb c chip it goes to 0.320v. 
Is this line shorted ?
Voltage reading 0b

title: 820-01041 no power
message:
Did you check diode mode after each chip removed?
I suppose only one was bad...

title: 820-01041 no power
message:
Yes, finally I found a short on CD32 chip and i replaced it. All chips are good now, but i unfortunately i reballed the T2 chip with the upper side, Without any need.
Now i have 5v0 and 0.2amps and after 10 sec it drops to 0 amps.

All voltage are good on the sequence diagram until ssd voltage.
SSD_PMU_RESET_L 1.8V
PP1V8_SSD 0V
PP0V9_SSD 0V

title: 820-01041 no power
message: Try DFU revive; let see if SSD comes on.

title: 820-01041 no power
message: I can't get to DFU mode...

title: 820-01041 no power
message:
Should be recognizex in DFU, even no SSD voltages present.
All AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages must be present.

Check diode mode to ground on SSD power rails.
